title: Does the proposal fall in the category of tower-like structure vide Regulation 2(iv)()124 and 41(2)(
clause_text: Does the proposal fall in the category of tower-like structure vide Regulation 2(iv)()124 and 41(2)(i)(c)? If so, does it comply with the requirement thereof?
